body:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49462

#### PR description:

Title says it all.
This is a follow-up to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49329.
I add new relval `autoHLT` keys for the HI workflows and use them where necessary. This way we can more readily control when a given year needs to exercise HLT testing in the Heavy Ion relvals.

#### PR validation:

`runTheMatrix.py -l 162,182,143.201 -i all --ibeos`

runs.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

plain backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49462 to `CMSSW_15_1_X` (2025 PbPb production release)
title: slightly better control over menus run in HIon relvals [15.1.X]
